Body:
sj = StringJoiner(prefix='[', suffix=']')
sj.add('e1').add('e2').add(3)
sj[0] = '1e'
self.assertEqual('[1e,e2,3]', str(sj))
expected__repr__ = (
    '{"separator": ",", "prefix": "[", "suffix": "]", "nelem": 3, "str_length": 9, "elements": ["1e", "e2", "3"]}'
    )
self.assertEqual(expected__repr__, sj.__repr__())
